Articles.Content:
I am running KSP on a MBP and it crashes at start up when its almost done. I do not know what is causing it to crash and I have too many mods to know which one, I do know the KAS mod "outdated" because it tells me even though I have updated it to the latest release(6.3). How can I figure out what is causing the crash and how do I update KAS even though it is updated?

For KAS it tells me I need 6.3.
